channel.title: Community on Nathan Laundry's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Nathan Laundry's Blog

item.title: Reconnecting a New Graduate Student Community Post-Covid
item.description: Tldr; 📧 What Canadian Computer Science Lost in the COVID Years 📣 How the Loss of Pillar Events will be Felt by our Communities 📶 Connection for Graduate Computer Science Students 🦋 Emergent research ideas: how connectivity leads to inspiration 💔 The Splintering of Research Communities 🔗 How do we Un-Splinter The COVID Generation of Researchers? 📲 Concluding: a Call to Action 📧 What Canadian Computer Science Lost in the COVID Years We’ve all read enough “Covid sucks and here’s why” articles.
